data.name: 老子才不注册呢 - neither register nor login
data.description:
拒绝注册！拒绝登陆！拒绝客户端！去你大爷的全屏提示登陆注册！还有新浪博客傻逼兮兮的安装flash！
对我常用又不想登陆的多个网站生效。如果你有建议增加进来的网站，请联系我。

data.name: 爱奇艺 美化
data.description: ▼▼▼▼注意▼▼▼▼▼:浏览器主题为暗色才能正常显示,▼▼▼▼▼chrome主题为Slinky 典雅,edge为深色模式▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼,其他没有暗色主题的浏览器用Dark Reader之类的夜间插件也可以▼▼▼▼▼把一些页面改为暗色,妈妈再也不用担心屏幕太亮了ヾ(●´∀｀●)

data.name: 极简-qq空间即qzone样式
data.description: #基本功能特点 - 优化了大多数元素（减少了信息量；以后会把必要的慢慢添上 - 优化输入框，编辑说说会舒服一些 #其他信息 - 我按照chrome浏览器写的，想必多数人都用它吧；如果不兼容，告诉我也许会改一改。 - 缺乏灵感了，如果你有好想法我一定会试一试的；如果你允许，我会在标明作者给你留个空。 #联系我 - 邮箱：👉whitephoenix@foxmail.com👈 快开学了，上stylish的频率会减少，所以更新速度不会太快 希望反馈可以更详尽一些（麻烦了 ⭐其他样式⭐ - 「白」-qzone-qq空间

data.name: Stylus Theme (Dark Side)
data.description: this style is a remastered and improved style from the Stylus Theme (Dark). muchas gracias for Randy W. Sims, an author of it, for his huge work, which help us to save our eyes from the ruinous light. Come to the Dark Side this style goes well with the darcula theme of the editor, imho. but feel free with your own experiments.

data.name: Plex Less Orange More Black
data.description: Attempt to make Plex web (desktop) less orange and more black. Very much botch job CSS code.

data.name: KanbanFlow Material Theme
data.description: A simple material theme to modernify the KanbanFlow website.

data.name: Original Dark Mesh for manganelo
data.description: Original Creator of the theme. Just leave a comment if you wish any change. It has mix of gray and black to relax your eyes. Also works on mangakakalot.com

data.name: RedFlagDeals.com Dark Mode (Updated 2020)
data.description: This is a style for Red Flag Deals (also known as RedFlagDeals.com). It's specifically meant for the the Hot Deals page and all threads, though it should work on the whole forum. This is based on another style on here that is long outdated, and no longer works.

data.name: Wordpress Dark Mode
data.description: This is a dark mode for the Wordpress backend, using the older style post editor. Not pure black but a dark grey. Dark mode FTW ;)

data.name: Google Docs Dark FlameCaro
data.description: Just wanna have a nice dark theme
